explains: n. 臭氧；（尤指海边的）清新空气；臭氧层（ozone layer 的简写）
wordGroup: ozone hole 臭氧层空洞（等于ozone low）
ozone depletion 臭氧消耗；臭氧枯竭
ozone resistance 耐臭氧；抗臭氧性

sentences.en: Ozone is a highly reactive form of oxygen gas.
sentences.cn: 臭氧是一种高度活跃的氧气形态。

sentences.en: The ozone layer screens out dangerous rays from the sun.
sentences.cn: 臭氧层能遮挡住来自太阳的有害射线。

sentences.en: It is widely known that CFCs can damage the ozone layer.
sentences.cn: 众所周知氯氟烃会破坏臭氧层。
